level.heading: DOME LIGHT INSTALLATION BUSINESS – COMPLIANCE WITH LICENSING REQUIREMENTSÂ§ 31-1506)

level.text: If at any time during the term of the dome light installation business license, the Chairman becomes aware that the licensee no longer meets the requirements for a dome light installation business license, the Commission may suspend or revoke the license or deny any application for renewal.
Nothing contained herein shall limit the authority of the Chairman to summarily suspend the license of any dome light installation business where a threat to public health, safety, or welfare exists.
The Office of Administrative Hearings shall hear appeals of actions taken by the Commission pursuant to Sections 1506.1 and 1506.2.
